common.name: Name
common.previousPage: Previous page is not available yet
common.nextPage: Next page is not available yet

clients.title: Simplify Your Procurement Process
clients.description: As a client on our platform, you get access to verified suppliers, competitive quotes, and a streamlined procurement process. Focus on your business while we handle the sourcing.

benefit1.title: Verified Suppliers
benefit1.desc: All suppliers are pre-vetted for quality and reliability

benefit2.title: Easy RFQ Process
benefit2.desc: Submit requests and receive competitive quotes quickly

benefit3.title: Transparent Pricing
benefit3.desc: Clear pricing with no hidden fees

benefit4.title: Dedicated Support
benefit4.desc: Get help from our team throughout your journey

suppliers.title: Grow Your Business with New Clients
suppliers.description: Join our network of trusted suppliers and connect with verified businesses looking for your products. Expand your reach and increase your sales through our managed marketplace.

benefit1.title: Access New Clients
benefit1.desc: Connect with pre-qualified businesses actively seeking suppliers

benefit2.title: Grow Revenue
benefit2.desc: Increase sales through a steady stream of RFQ opportunities

benefit3.title: Secure Payments
benefit3.desc: Get paid reliably through our managed payment system

benefit4.title: Performance Insights
benefit4.desc: Track your quotes, orders, and business metrics

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your B2B Transactions?
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses already using our platform to streamline their procurement and sales.

landing.title: {{brandName}}
landing.subtitle: B2B Marketplace
landing.heroSubtitle: Post your requirements, receive competitive quotes from verified suppliers, and manage every order — all on one intelligent platform.
landing.forClientsDesc: Post requirements and receive competitive quotes from pre-vetted suppliers. No searching, no cold calls — just results.
landing.forSuppliersDesc: Receive qualified RFQs from real buyers. Quote, win, and fulfill — with guaranteed payment through our managed process.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your procurement
howItWorks.step1Desc: Describe what you need — products, quantities, and delivery timeline. Our system matches you with qualified suppliers.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Receive competitive quotes from multiple verified suppliers. Compare pricing, delivery, and quality side by side.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Accept the best quote, track fulfillment, and manage payments — all in one dashboard with full transparency.

features.title: Why Choose {{brandName}}?
features.verifiedDesc: Every supplier is vetted for quality, reliability, and compliance — so you can buy with confidence.
features.competitiveDesc: Receive multiple quotes to ensure you always get the best value for your procurement.
features.streamlinedDesc: From RFQ to delivery, manage your entire supply chain in one platform.
features.anonymousDesc: Supplier identities are hidden during the quoting phase, ensuring fair and unbiased pricing.
features.analyticsDesc: Track quotes, orders, and supplier performance with live dashboards and exportable reports.
features.secureDesc: Built-in payment management with credit controls and automated invoicing.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Procurement?
cta.subtitle: Join Saudi Arabia's fastest-growing B2B marketplace. Get started in minutes.

orders.title: Orders Management
orders.wonDescription: This section lists all purchase orders where your quote has been accepted by the client. Client names are anonymized for privacy. You can search, filter, and view detailed information for each won order.
orders.completedDescription: This section lists all successfully delivered and closed orders. You can search, filter, and view detailed information for each completed order. Client names are anonymized for privacy.

orders.chatLinkedMessage: Messages are linked to each order record.

settings.title: Platform Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure system-wide parameters and automation rules
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
settings.passwordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match.
settings.passwordMustDiffer: New password must be different from current password.
settings.autoQuoteEnabledDesc: When enabled, the system will automatically generate quotes for RFQs that receive no supplier response within the configured delay.
settings.autoQuoteDisabledDesc: The auto-quote system is currently turned off. RFQs will not be automatically quoted.
settings.autoQuoteHelp: RFQs will be automatically quoted if no suppliers respond within this time.
settings.marginHelp: Margin applied to the supplier's selling price for auto-generated quotes. Category-specific margins will override this if higher.
settings.rfqDefaultExpiryDaysHelp: Client RFQs automatically use this expiry window. Clients can view it but cannot override it.
settings.limitedStockDesc: When enabled, auto-quotes will include items with limited stock availability.
settings.notificationsDesc: Event types that trigger platform notifications
settings.notifReadOnlyHint: Notification templates are managed via the database. This view is read-only.

notifEventDesc.account_created: Triggered when a new account is registered on the platform
notifEventDesc.account_approved: Triggered when an admin approves a user account
notifEventDesc.account_suspended: Triggered when an admin suspends a user account
notifEventDesc.kyc_submitted: Triggered when a user submits KYC verification documents
notifEventDesc.kyc_verified: Triggered when KYC verification is completed successfully
notifEventDesc.product_submitted: Triggered when a supplier submits a new product for approval
notifEventDesc.product_approved: Triggered when an admin approves a product listing
notifEventDesc.product_rejected: Triggered when an admin rejects a product listing
notifEventDesc.rfq_submitted: Triggered when a client submits a new RFQ
notifEventDesc.rfq_quoted: Triggered when a supplier submits a quote for an RFQ
notifEventDesc.rfq_expired: Triggered when an RFQ passes its expiry date without quotes
notifEventDesc.quote_received: Triggered when a client receives a new quote
notifEventDesc.quote_approved: Triggered when an admin approves a quote for client review
notifEventDesc.quote_accepted: Triggered when a client accepts a quote
notifEventDesc.quote_rejected: Triggered when a quote is rejected
notifEventDesc.order_created: Triggered when a new order is created from an accepted quote
notifEventDesc.order_confirmed: Triggered when an admin confirms an order
notifEventDesc.order_shipped: Triggered when an order is shipped
notifEventDesc.order_delivered: Triggered when an order is delivered
notifEventDesc.payment_received: Triggered when a payment is received and confirmed

settings.runAutoQuoteNowDesc: Manually trigger the auto-quote check for all eligible RFQs immediately.

help.description: Find answers to common questions and manage your support requests.
help.faq1q: How do I submit an RFQ?
help.faq1a: Navigate to Browse Items, select the products you need, set quantities, and click Submit RFQ.
help.faq2q: How do I track my orders?
help.faq2a: Go to the Orders tab in the sidebar to see all your orders and their current status.
help.faq3q: How do I request a credit increase?
help.faq3a: On the Dashboard, find the Credit Overview section and click "Request Increase" to submit your request.
help.faq4a: On the RFQ list page, click "View Quotes" on any RFQ that has received quotes. You can compare prices, lead times, and supplier ratings.
help.faq5a: Click "Create a Support Request" above, or email us at support@mwrd.com.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.poSubmittedMessage: Your PO has been submitted for admin confirmation.
notifications.poPendingAdminMessage: Your PO is pending verification. MWRD will confirm within 24 hours.
notifications.poConfirmedMessage: Order {{orderId}} was confirmed and sent to supplier.
